commit message:
Using number format restricted usage to positive numbers only (no minus sign). Unfortunately, using text format defaults to text keyboard.

I need to think of a way to open a numeric keyboard while keeping the text format.

Merge pull request #5 from rengolin/issue1

Allow negative numbers (and text, unfortunately) on update score.

Increase score input text a bit

Quick fix for now, but this needs to scale properly with text, scores, and other input boxes. Layout changes only on 1.2, so this has to wait.

Merge pull request #6 from rengolin/issues

Increase score input text a bit

Adding checkbox for play forever

Setting the score to zero would crash the app. Now, it means no winner,
ie. play forever. Also, adding a checkbox to make that clearer.

Fixes #2

Fix 'last game' list of players bug

Previously, when adding names to the list, wouldn't add them to
the game list, just to the preferences, so when loading names from a
previous game, you'd get them on the list, but not on the game.

Fixes #8

Merge pull request #9 from rengolin/issues

Fix 'last game' list of players bug
